greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} T(n,k) * T(n,n+k), with T given by A027052.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: elif k=0 or k=2 or k=2*n then 1
seq( add(T(n,k)*T(n,n+k), k=0..n), n=0..30); # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 07 2019
program: elif (k==0 or k==2 or k==2*n): return 1
else: return sum(T(n-1, k-j) for j in (1..3))
[sum(T(n,k)*T(n,n+k) for k in (0..n)) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 07 2019
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
